pages.text: Goliath is a massive pirate ship carrying 36 cannons. Its devastating power and ruthless crew has caused the demise of many who encountered it.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/salvo)$(l)No Escape/$$(br)Goliath's crew moves all its cannons to one side and fires all of them, damaging $(l)10 opponent tiles in a line/$. This ability has $(l)1 Use/$ and costs $(l)12 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/suppression)$(l)Sore Loser/$$(br)$(l)As Goliath sinks/$, the crew quickly fires as many cannons as they can, damaging $(l)10 random opponent tiles/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
